value.title: Azure Friday | Use the Azure portal to answer your billing questions
value.excerpt: Tommy Nguyen joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Billing in the Azure portal. value.title: Code to Cloud with Docker and Azure Container Instances | Azure Friday
